quote: I prefer quality over flash — that’s why I refuse to write my signature in cursive.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: People are idiots
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Busy? Impossible. I work for the government.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I keep a sizable supply of ground chuck in my desk. Remove it or it will begin to smell.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: No adult men in costumes.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I work hard to make sure my department is as small and as ineffective as possible.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: There will be no f***ing vegetables.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: When I walked in this morning and saw that the flag was half-mast, I thought ‘All right, another bureaucrat ate it!
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I love being a father but there are a few things I miss: Silence. The absence of noise. One single moment undisturbed by the sounds of a children’s program called Doc McStuffins. There is no quiet anymore. There is only Doc McStuffins.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I would rather bleed out than sit here and talk about my feelings for 10 mins.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Passing the Buck. The last refuge of the cowardly and Blackhearted
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Haha, “Euro-trash,” I like that. That is indeed a garbage continent.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Literally everything is a weapon, son. That folder, in my hands, is far deadlier than this bow of yours.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Clear alcohols are for rich women on diets.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Crying: acceptable at funerals and the Grand Canyon.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I call this turf ‘n’ turf. It's a 16 oz T-bone and a 24 oz porterhouse. Also, whiskey and a cigar. I am going to consume all of this at the same time because I am a free American.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Under my tutelage, you will grow from boys to men. From men into gladiators. And from gladiators into Swansons.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I'm a simple man. I like pretty, dark-haired women, and breakfast food.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Never half-ass two things. Whole-ass one thing.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I don't want to paint with a broad brush here, but every single contractor in the world is a miserable, incompetent thief.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Fishing relaxes me. It's like yoga, except I still get to kill something.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Just give me all the bacon and eggs you have. Wait...wait. I worry what you just heard was: Give me a lot of bacon and eggs. What I said was: Give me all the bacon and eggs you have. Do you understand?
name: Ron Swanson

quote: When people get a little too chummy with me I like to call them by the wrong name to let them know I don't really care about them.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: There's only one thing I hate more than lying: skim milk. Which is water that's lying about being milk.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: The government is a greedy piglet that suckles on a taxpayer's teat until they have sore, chapped nipples.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: The less I know about other people's affairs, the happier I am. I'm not interested in caring about people. I once worked with a guy for three years and never learned his name. Best friend I ever had. We still never talk sometimes.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: When I eat, it is the food that is scared.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: My only official recommendations are US Army-issued mustache trimmers, Morton's Salt, and the C.R. Lawrence Fein two inch axe-style scraper oscillating knife blade.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Are you going to tell a man that he can't fart in his own car?
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Turkey can never beat cow.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: It's always a good idea to demonstrate to your coworkers that you are capable of withstanding a tremendous amount of pain.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: There are three acceptable haircuts: high and tight, crew cut, buzz cut.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Capitalism: God's way of determining who is smart and who is poor.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Any dog under fifty pounds is a cat and cats are useless.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Fish, for sport only, not for meat. Fish meat is practically a vegetable.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: There is only one bad word: taxes.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: History began July 4th, 1776. Anything before that was a mistake.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Cultivating a manly musk puts opponent on notice.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Give a man a fish and feed him for a day. Don't teach a man to fish… and feed yourself. He's a grown man. And fishing's not that hard.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Child labor laws are ruining this country.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Great job, everyone. The reception will be held in each of our individual houses, alone.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: America: The only country that matters. If you want to experience other ‘cultures,’ use an atlas or a ham radio.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: The key to burning an ex-wife effigy is to dip it in paraffin wax and then toss the flaming bottle of isopropyl alcohol from a safe distance. Do not stand too close when you light an ex-wife effigy.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: There are only three ways to motivate people: money, fear, and hunger.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Shorts over six inches are capri pants, shorts under six inches are European.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Friends: one to three is sufficient.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Breakfast food can serve many purposes.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Honor: if you need it defined, you don't have it.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: One rage every three months is permitted. Try not to hurt anyone who doesn't deserve it.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Strippers do nothing for me…but I will take a free breakfast buffet anytime, anyplace.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I like saying ‘No,’ it lowers their enthusiasm.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: You had me at meat tornado.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: There must be a mistake, you've accidentally given me the food that my food eats.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Son, there is no wrong way to consume alcohol.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Keep your tears in your eyes where they belong.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I've cried twice in my life. Once when I was seven and hit by a school bus. And then again when I heard that Li'l Sebastian has passed.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I hate everything.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I love nothing.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I love riddles!
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Don't waste energy moving unless necessary.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I'll take that steak to go. Please and thank you.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Creativity is for people with glasses who like to lie.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Children are terrible artists and artists are crooks.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Tom put all my records into this rectangle!
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I believe luck is a concept invented by the weak to explain their failures.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: What's cholesterol?
name: Ron Swanson

quote: People who buy things are suckers.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I'm going to get 12 eggs and part of a dead animal. Dealer's choice. Please and thank you.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I wanna punch you in the face so bad right now.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Normally, if given the choice between doing something and nothing, I’d choose to do nothing. But I will do something if it helps someone else do nothing. I’d work all night, if it meant nothing got done.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Dear frozen yogurt, you are the celery of desserts. Be ice cream or be nothing. Zero stars.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: There has never been a sadness that can’t been cured by breakfast food.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: If any of you need anything at all, too bad. Deal with your problems yourselves, like adults.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: It’s pointless for a human to paint scenes of nature when they can go outside and stand in it.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: On my deathbed, my final wish is to have my ex-wives rush to my side so I can use my dying breath to tell them both to go to hell one last time.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I was born ready. I’m Ron F***ing Swanson.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Don’t start chasing applause and acclaim. That way lies madness.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: If there were more food and fewer people, this would be a perfect party.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Put some alcohol in your mouth to block with words from coming out.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Give 100%. 110% is impossible. Only idiots recommend that.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Birthdays were invented by Hallmark to sell cards.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Sting like a bee. Do not float like a butterfly. That’s ridiculous.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: My first ex-wife’s name is Tammy. My second ex-wife’s name is Tammy. My Mom’s name is Tamara…she goes by Tammy.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Do you have any history of mental illness in your family? I have an uncle who does yoga.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: The whole point of this country is if you want to eat garbage, balloon up to 600 pounds and die of a heart attack at 43, you can! You are free to do so. To me, that’s beautiful.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Capitalism is the only way … It makes America great, England OK and France terrible.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Veganism is the sad result of a morally corrupt mind. Reconsider your life.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Barbecues should be about one thing: good shared meat.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Well, I am not usually one for speeches. So, goodbye.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I regret nothing. The end.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I like Tom. He doesn’t do a lot of work around here. He shows zero initiative. He’s not a team player. He’s never wanted to go that extra mile. Tom is exactly what I’m looking for in a government employee.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I enjoy government functions like I enjoy getting kicked in the nuggets with a steel toed boot.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I like some changes. Like when I change a tree into a canoe, or a wife into an ex-wife.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I’ve had the same haircut since 1978 and I’ve driven the same car since 1991. I’ve used the same wooden comb for three decades. I have one bowl. I still get my milk delivered by horse.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I leave no meat behind. It’s an honor thing.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: An hour ago a giant fireball consumed my entire face and it was far preferable to spending another second with you.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Go back to the library where you belong.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Once a year, every branch of this government meets in a room and announces what they intend to waste taxpayer money on.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Every time she laughs, an angel dies. Even telemarketers avoid her. Her birth was payback for the sins of man. But you know the worst thing about her? She works for the library.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Say what you want about organized religion, but those bastards knew how to construct an edifice.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I change my locks every 16 days.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: It's an impossible puzzle, and I love puzzles!
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Is Star Wars the one with the wizard boy?
name: Ron Swanson

quote: My son is several weeks old. He is very familiar with the sound of power tools.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Live your life how you want, but don’t confuse drama with happiness.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: In my opinion, not enough people have looked their dinner in the eyes and considered the circle of life.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: If it doesn’t have meat, it’s a snack.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: An ideal night out, to me, is stepping onto my porch area and grilling up a thick slab of something’s flesh and then popping in a highlight real from the WNBA.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: On nights like this when the cold winds blow, the air is awash in the swirling eddies of our dream, come with me and find safe haven in a warm bathtub full of my jazz.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: First rule. No conversation lasts longer than 100 total words.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I will leave my children $50 a piece. Enough for the cab ride home from the funeral and a steak dinner. End of discussion.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: The three most useless jobs in the world in order are: lawyer, congressman, and doctor.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I've had the same will since I was 8 years old. Upon my death, I will transfer all of my belongings to the man or animal who has killed me.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Standard birth control methods are usually ineffective against a Swanson.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I believe in cutting useless government projects. I also believe in cutting useful government projects.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I've never been hungover. After I've had too much whiskey, I cook myself a large flank steak, pan fried and salted butter. I eat that, put on a pair of wet socks and go to sleep.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: Every two weeks I need to sand down my toe nails. They're too strong for clippers.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: We have one activity planned: not getting killed.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: When I'm done eating a Mulligan's meal, for weeks afterwards, there are flecks of meat in my mustache. And I refuse to clean it because every now and then a piece of meat will fall into my mouth.
name: Ron Swanson

quote: I have a hernia. I’ve had it for a while, and I’ve been ignoring it successfully. But uh, this morning, I made the mistake of sneezing. But as long as I sit still and don’t move my head or torso, I’m good.
name: Ron Swanson
